entry.data:
CLEAR
PATCHY FOG
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
